<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sudden Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=134) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 88 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing. Stride twice. If you end your movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, you can make a melee Strike against that enemy. You can use Sudden Charge while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.
name: Sudden Charge
